definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayerMP</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Goldenchielbloking</field><comment h="45" pinned="true" w="135">Replace with your blocking shield item.</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
